views.markdown:
Bug fixes Performance enhancements Fixes for iOS 8 Updated look Updated settings Updated dependencies to include the preference bundle loader for users having issues loading the preferences. Applist is now a dependency required for utilizing the preference bundle, without it, the preferences will fail to load.

Updating settings to allow individual application access, better memory management, and the color pink. Added ability to change the touch color and the trailing distance

Added additional description and screenshots, added settings support to include contact options, and fixed a bug with orientation resizing
